name: USphereComponent
doc: A sphere generally used for simple collision. Bounds are rendered as lines in the editor.

methods.name: GetScaledSphereRadius
methods.doc: @return the radius of the sphere, with component scale applied.

methods.name: GetShapeScale
methods.doc:
Get the scale used by this shape. This is a uniform scale that is the minimum of any non-uniform scaling.
@return the scale used by this shape.

methods.name: GetUnscaledSphereRadius
methods.doc: @return the radius of the sphere, ignoring component scale.

methods.name: SetSphereRadius
